QuestData.Title: Disarmament
QuestData.Description: We must discover the secret to these savages' weapons!$b$bIf you'd have seen how easily they cut through my companions, you'd understand my sense of urgency.$b$bScour the place. Gather all of their arms that you can carry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dark Ranger Marrah wants you to steal 5 Vrykul Weapons from Utgarde Keep and bring them to her inside Utgarde Keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to steal their arms?
QuestData.RewardText: Every blade we take from them is one less embedded in a soldier's flesh.$B$BThank you.
